tags.name: lrndesign-panelcard
tags.description:
`lrndesign-panelcard`
A LRN element

Attributes:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title of the panel

  * `elevation` {`number`} - Height of the paper.

  * `coloredText` {`boolean`} - Applies the color to the text instead of the background

Properties:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title of the panel

  * `elevation` {`number`} - Height of the paper.

  * `coloredText` {`boolean`} - Applies the color to the text instead of the background

attributes.name: title
attributes.description:
`title` {`string`} - Title of the panel

Property: title

Default: Block heading

attributes.name: elevation
attributes.description:
`elevation` {`number`} - Height of the paper.

Property: elevation

Default: 2

attributes.name: coloredText
attributes.description:
`coloredText` {`boolean`} - Applies the color to the text instead of the background

Property: coloredText

Default: false
